ygData.subject: Book: The Art of Artificial Evolution

According to google this book/chapter also has references to NEAT in
it. Possibly another interesting/relevant read:

Part 1: Chapter 1: Evolutionary Visual Art and Design
http://www.springerlink.com/content/nxx451434787376w/


More info here:

http://art-artificial-evolution.dei.uc.pt/abstracts.htm#chap1


I would have read them myself and let the group know what I thought -
but at $25 per chapter I thought it best to elicit a response here
first and buy later :)

Colin.
